events.message: Customer reported a car collision that occurred on April 30th causing significant front-end damage.
The claim was reviewed and classified under Auto Accident based on the details provided by the customer.
An agent specializing in vehicle accident claims was assigned to handle the case promptly.
Acknowledgment of the claim was sent to the customer reassuring them that the process is underway.
The customer was asked to submit photos of the damaged vehicle and the police report for further evaluation.
Customer provided all requested documents including pictures and official accident report within the deadline.
The investigation team began analyzing submitted evidence and contacted witnesses to verify accident details.
Investigation concluded confirming the accident circumstances and assessing vehicle damage extent.
A settlement offer was prepared and presented to the customer considering repair estimates and policy coverage.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the prompt offer and clarity in communication regarding claim settlement.
The claim was officially approved based on settlement terms agreed upon by both parties.
Payment was transferred to the customerâ€™s account to cover repair expenses as per the approved claim.
After payment issuance, the claim was closed successfully marking the resolution of the auto accident case.
The closed claim files and all relevant documents were archived for future reference and compliance.
